message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this exceptional product with you. It's a rare opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $15000.
I'm interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12000?
I understand that $12000 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $13500.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12500?
I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to make a slightly larger concession. I can offer it to you for $14000.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12800?
I can see we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession to get the sale done. I can offer it to you for $13500.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $13000?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to the sweet spot, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession to get the deal done. I can offer it to you for $13250.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $13000?
